1.title: The Special Express

episode of.title: Thomas & Friends: Thomas & The Super Station (TV Mini-Series 2017)

1.plot: After confusion and delay on the Narrow Gauge Railway, Sir Topham Hatt has a special plan that will change Sodor forever. Elsewhere can Thomas and James learn to be useful with some old friends?

2.title: Cranky's Crisis!

episode of.title: Thomas & Friends: Thomas & The Super Station (TV Mini-Series 2017)

2.plot: Sir Topham Hat had a new shed called the Super Station built with the help of Thomas and his friends. But after a hard days work, James and Victor decided to have a little fun and race down the tracks and are about to crash.

3.title: Gordon the Little Engine

episode of.title: Thomas & Friends: Thomas & The Super Station (TV Mini-Series 2017)

3.plot: After James has a little trouble on the rails at the Super Station, Gordon comes to help to pull the Special Express. But later that night, Gordon will see himself in a whole new way.

4.title: Thomas and the Great Rainstorm: Stormy Weather

episode of.title: Thomas & Friends: Thomas & The Super Station (TV Mini-Series 2017)

4.plot: Connor and the Narrow Gauge Engines are having fun racing at the Super Station but Toby is worried about the storm. Meanwhile, Thomas and Rosie are on their way to the dam with a very important shipment of stone.

5.title: Bridge Escape!

episode of.title: Thomas & Friends: Thomas & The Super Station (TV Mini-Series 2017)

5.plot: During a terrible storm, the Sodor dam broke and now Thomas, Rosie and Gordon have to get away. Meanwhile at the Super Station, Toby and Emily are waiting out the storm but are unaware that danger is even closer than they think.

6.title: Save the Super Station!

episode of.title: Thomas & Friends: Thomas & The Super Station (TV Mini-Series 2017)

6.plot: A really bad storm on Sodor has been causing all kinds of confusion and delay on Sodor. Thomas, Rosie and Gordon are going to help but just as they were crossing a bridge a huge out of control ship was coming towards them.

imdb.plot outline: The Thomas Creator Collective is back with an all new adventure. After confusion and delay on the Narrow Gauge Railway, Sir Topham Hatt has a special plan that will change Sodor forever. Elsewhere can Thomas and James learn to be useful with some old friends?
